Posts.Content: Kimberly1965 wrote: I was diagnosed last week with IDC as of right now I'm grade 3 stage 2. But waiting on scan results and have not had lymp node stuff done yet. The tumor was 2.4 cm. but feels like it has grown in the past two weeks. Arm pit has been very sore for a long time and noticing pain in collarbone area. I already hate all the test and having to go to drs. I am so worried about financial stuff I already want to call it all off. How can a person get through this and keep their sanity when I am already so tired doing a days work is taking all I have. Total exhaustion have invaded me. I also have MS and other health issues. If I don't work I can't pay bills and won't have insurance. What am I going to do? Dx 12/19/2012, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed recently Kimberly1965 dlb823
